content.question: A box of mass <math alttext="m" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>m</mi></math> is initially at rest on a horizontal surface. The box is then pulled to the right and travels a distance <math alttext="d" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>d</mi></math> in time <math alttext="t" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>t</mi></math> with a constant acceleration. Which of the following is a correct expression for the average power delivered to the box during time <math alttext="t" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>t</mi></math>?

choices.label: <math alttext="the fraction with numerator 2 m d squared and denominator t squared, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>m</mi><msup><mi>d</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><msup><mi>t</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator 2 m d squared and denominator t cubed, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>m</mi><msup><mi>d</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><msup><mi>t</mi><mn>3</mn></msup></mfrac></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction m d squared over 2 t squared, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mrow><mi>m</mi><msup><mi>d</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><msup><mi>t</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow></mfrac></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction m d squared over 2 t cubed, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mrow><mi>m</mi><msup><mi>d</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><msup><mi>t</mi><mn>3</mn></msup></mrow></mfrac></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the fraction with numerator 2 m d squared and denominator t cubed, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>m</mi><msup><mi>d</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><msup><mi>t</mi><mn>3</mn></msup></mfrac></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
